mapper.select: SELECT MASTER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE PL_STAT = '1' -- 처리상태 : 미요청 AND PL_REG_STAT = '1' -- 모집인상태 : 승인전 AND TO_CHAR(REG_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 month', 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT USER_SEQ FROM tb_lc_users WHERE (last_login_dt + '3 month'::interval) <= now() AND inactive_yn = 'N'
SELECT MASTER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE PL_STAT = '9' AND PL_REGIST_NO IS NULL

SELECT * FROM tb_lc_schedule WHERE schedule_name = #{scheduleName} AND status in ('1', '3')
AND reg_time < (now() - interval'4 days') AND reg_time > (now() - interval'4 days 30minutes')
AND reg_time > (now() - interval'30 minute')

select MASTER_SEQ , CON_NUM , COM_CODE , FN_CELLPHONE(PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE , PL_CLASS , PL_PRODUCT , PL_REG_STAT , PL_STAT , PL_REGIST_NO , CI , PL_M_NAME , PL_M_Z_ID , COM_CONT_DATE , PL_MERCHANT_NAME , PL_CEO_NAME , PL_MERCHANT_NO , PL_BUSINESS_NO , COMP_PHONE_NO , PL_HIST_CD , COM_HAEJI_DATE , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') as CRE_HAEJI_DATE from tb_lc_mas01 where PL_STAT = '4' and com_haeji_date <= TO_CHAR(NOW() - INTERVAL '4 minutes', 'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.update: update tb_lc_mas01 set upd_timestamp = NOW() , upd_seq = 0 , api_res_msg = #{apiResMsg} where master_seq = #{masterSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lc_schedule WHERE schedule_name = #{scheduleName} AND status != '2' AND property02 = #{property02}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_lc_users_indv_req SET stat = '2' , comp_date = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , upd_seq = #{regSeq} , upd_timestamp = NOW() WHERE user_indv_req_seq = #{userIndvReqSeq}
UPDATE tb_lc_users_corp_req SET stat = '2' , comp_date = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , upd_seq = #{regSeq} , upd_timestamp = NOW() WHERE user_corp_req_seq = #{userCorpReqSeq}
mapper.select: select name as scheduleName from shedlock

select
tlsh.* from tb_lc_schedule_hist tlsh where req_cnt > 0 and req_cnt != success_cnt and start_time > (now() - interval'3 day')

SELECT schedule_seq , schedule_name , param , case when status = '1' then '30분 초과' when status = '3' then '오류' else '성공' end status , reg_time , start_time , error FROM tb_lc_schedule WHERE (status in ('3') OR (status in ('1') AND reg_time < (now() - interval'30 minute')))
AND schedule_name = #{scheduleName}
mapper.update: update tb_lc_schedule set reg_time = now() , status = '1' , param = #{param} , upd_timestamp = NOW() , upd_seq = 0 where schedule_seq = #{scheduleSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lc_schedule WHERE status != '2' AND property03 = #{property03} AND property04 = #{property04}
select COUNT(*) from kfb_api_key kak where ins_dt = to_Char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_lc_users_inactive ( user_seq , user_id , password , user_name , mobile_no , pl_class , pl_m_z_id , email , user_ci , manager_name , manager_mobile_no , manager_email , corp_appr_yn , corp_appr_dt , file_seq , join_dt , terms_yn , terms_dt , drop_yn , drop_dt , inactive_yn , inactive_dt , last_login_dt , fail_cnt , fail_stop_dt , pw_change_dt , pw_token , pw_token_dt , reg_seq , reg_timestamp , upd_seq , upd_timestamp , crf_cd , role_name , appr_txt) select user_seq, user_id, password, user_name, mobile_no, pl_class, pl_m_z_id, email, user_ci, manager_name, manager_mobile_no , manager_email, corp_appr_yn, corp_appr_dt, file_seq, join_dt, terms_yn, terms_dt, drop_yn, drop_dt, inactive_yn, NOW(), last_login_dt, fail_cnt, fail_stop_dt, pw_change_dt, pw_token, pw_token_dt, 0, NOW(), 0, NOW(), crf_cd, role_name, appr_txt from tb_lc_users where user_seq = #{userSeq}

UPDATE tb_lc_users SET user_id='' , password='' , user_name='' , mobile_no='' , pl_class='' , pl_m_z_id='' , email='' , user_ci='' , manager_name='' , manager_mobile_no='' , manager_email='' , corp_appr_yn='' , file_seq=0 , terms_yn='' , drop_yn='' , inactive_yn='Y' , inactive_dt=NOW() , fail_cnt=0 , pw_token='' , reg_seq=0 , reg_timestamp=NOW() , upd_seq=0 , upd_timestamp=NOW() , crf_cd='' , role_name='' , appr_txt='' WHERE user_seq=#{userSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,PL_CLASS ,FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE PL_REG_STAT = '4' AND TO_DATE(CRE_HAEJI_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') + INTERVAL'${interval} years' <= NOW()

SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,PL_CLASS ,FILE_SEQ ,REG_PATH ,PRE_LC_NUM FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE PL_REG_STAT = '1' AND PL_STAT IN = '1' AND TO_CHAR((UPD_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL'${interval} days'),'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.PL_CLASS ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TLM.REG_PATH ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM JOIN TB_LC_MAS01_STEP TLMS ON TLM.MASTER_SEQ = TLMS.MASTER_SEQ WHERE TLMS.PL_REG_STAT = '1' AND TLMS.PL_STAT = '5' GROUP BY TLM.MASTER_SEQ HAVING TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '1' AND TLM.PL_STAT = '5' AND TO_CHAR((MAX(TLMS.REG_TIMESTAMP) + INTERVAL'${interval} days'),'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,PL_CLASS ,FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE PL_REG_STAT = '2' AND PL_STAT IN = '8' AND TO_CHAR((UPD_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL'${interval} days'),'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,PL_CLASS ,FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE PL_REG_STAT = '1' AND PL_STAT IN = '16' AND TO_CHAR((UPD_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL'${interval} days'),'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,PL_CLASS ,FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}
SELECT EXC_SEQ ,MASTER_SEQ ,FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01_IMWON WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}
SELECT EXP_SEQ ,MASTER_SEQ ,FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01_EXPERT WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}
SELECT OPER_SEQ ,MASTER_SEQ ,FILE_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01_IT WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}
